content: I know today is hard. I've got your back.
You don't have to handle this alone.
Whatever you decide, I'm with you.
Take your time. I'll be here.
You've got this. But if you don't, I've got you.
I'm not going anywhere.
It's okay to not be okay right now.
You're stronger than you think. I see it.
Lean on me if you need to.
I know this is a lot. I'm here.
You don't have to figure it all out today.
I believe in you. Even when you don't.
One step at a time. We'll get through this.
You're not a burden. You're my person.
What do you need from me right now?
I'm proud of you for getting through today.
You've handled worse. You'll handle this.
I'll take whatever you can give right now.
You're allowed to fall apart. I'll hold the pieces.
I'm in your corner. Always.
This will pass. I'll be here when it does.
You don't have to be strong for me.
I see how hard you're trying. It's enough.
Let me carry some of this with you.
You're doing better than you think.
I'm here. Whatever that looks like right now.
Your feelings are valid. All of them.
You're not alone in this.
I know it's heavy. I'm here to help carry it.
Take the time you need. I'll be waiting.
You've survived 100% of your bad days so far.
I'm not trying to fix it. Just here with you.
You can do hard things. I've seen you do it.
Breathe. I've got the rest covered.
You're allowed to have bad days.
I'm your safe place. Use me.
Tomorrow is a new day. We'll face it together.
You're handling this better than you give yourself credit for.
I know you're exhausted. Rest. I'll handle it.
You don't have to pretend with me.
I married all of you. The hard parts too.
Tell me what you need. I'm listening.
You've been through worse. You'll make it through this.
I'm right here. Not going anywhere.
Let it out. I can take it.
We don't have to talk. I can just sit with you.
I see you. I see what you're going through.
You're still standing. That counts.
This season will end. I'll be here for the next one.
We're a team. Let me help.
